name: ab-datepicker
description: ab-datepicker is an accessible datepicker based on the example of the Open AJAX Alliance Accessibility Tools Task Force : [http://www.oaa-accessibility.org/examplep/datepicker1/](http://www.oaa-accessibility.org/examplep/datepicker1/) and Inspired by [http://wet-boew.github.io/wet-boew/demos/datepicker/datepicker-en.html](http://wet-boew.github.io/wet-boew/demos/datepicker/datepicker-en.html)
